2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>(1) <break time='200ms'/> At <break time='200ms'/> Home <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Mother: Upendran, what are you doing?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: <break time='200ms'/> Upendran, <break time='200ms'/> what <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> doing? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Upendran: I am drawing a picture for the art competition.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Upendran: <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> am <break time='200ms'/> drawing <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> picture <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> art <break time='200ms'/> competition. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Mother: Where is your sister? Is she watching cartoons again?
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: <break time='200ms'/> Where <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> sister? <break time='200ms'/> Is <break time='200ms'/> she <break time='200ms'/> watching <break time='200ms'/> cartoons <break time='200ms'/> again? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: Upendran: No, she is not watching cartoons. She is doing her homework.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Upendran: <break time='200ms'/> No, <break time='200ms'/> she <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> not <break time='200ms'/> watching <break time='200ms'/> cartoons. <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> doing <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> homework. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Mother: That's good. Your brothers are playing outside. Tell them not to go to the road.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: <break time='200ms'/> That's <break time='200ms'/> good. <break time='200ms'/> Your <break time='200ms'/> brothers <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> playing <break time='200ms'/> outside. <break time='200ms'/> Tell <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> not <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> go <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> road. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Upendran: Don't worry mother. They are playing hopscotch.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Upendran: <break time='200ms'/> Don't <break time='200ms'/> worry <break time='200ms'/> mother. <break time='200ms'/> They <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> playing <break time='200ms'/> hopscotch. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
